New Records: West Indies recorded their joint-largest win over England in T20s
England suffered their largest defeat in the T20 format
Key Match Events: Jason Holder took 4 for 7 as England was bowled out for 103 in 19.4 overs
Brandon King scored 52* to power the West Indies to a nine-wicket win
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Kieron Pollard praised the work of Sheldon Cottrell and Jason Holder, who shared six wickets in the match
Eoin Morgan admitted it was not the start to the series they would have wanted
Jason Holder said the loss to Ireland in the ODI series fired up the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2nd T20I is on Sunday at Bridgetown
West Indies lead the five-match series 1-0
The match was played at Kensington Oval, Barbados
Others: No other significant mentions beyond match performance
